items.title: Chrome is about to show even more safety warnings
items.summary: You’re going to start seeing more warnings in Chrome when accessing insecure sites. Starting next October, Chrome will soon warn users when they visit a public website without an encrypted HTTPS connection. Chrome already issues a “Your connection is not private” message when you visit pages that have an HTTPS connection that’s misconfigured. But this […]

items.title: Apollo Global reaches a deal to sell AOL to Bending Spoons, sources say in a deal valued at ~$1.5B; AOL has about 30M MAUs across its email and web properties (Sara Fischer/Axios)
items.summary:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Apollo Global reaches a deal to sell AOL to Bending Spoons, sources say in a deal valued at ~$1.5B; AOL has about 30M MAUs across its email and web properties  —  Apollo Global Management has reached a deal to sell AOL to Italian tech holding group Bending Spoons in a deal valued at roughly $1.5 billion, Axios has learned.

items.title: Nvidia becomes first public company worth $5 trillion
items.summary: With a market cap of $5 trillion, Nvidia is now worth more than the aggregated stock markets of all countries, apart from the United States, China and Japan.

items.title: Tesla’s Cybercab may have a steering wheel after all

To be sure, we still use steering wheels. But the Tesla Cybercab was meant to be the first vehicle of the new future, and there’s nothing […]

items.title: Govee’s Smart Electric Kettle Pro that comes with a tea infuser drops to its second-best price of the year for $63 (Reg. $90)
items.summary:
If you look in on Govee’s official Amazon storefront, you can find the Smart Electric Kettle Pro with Tea Infuser at $62.99 shipped. It’s coming down off its full $90 price tag here today, with discounts over the year mostly keeping the costs between $70 and $80, save for the one-time fall to $59 during Prime Day. We’ve seen things go as low as $58 in the past, with today’s deal giving you a $27 markdown to the second-best price of 2025 and the third-lowest price overall – just $5 above the low we last saw in 2024.

items.title: At least 132 killed in Rio police raid, officials say
items.summary: The police operation targeting a criminal gang in a densely-populated area of Rio is the deadliest in the city.

items.title: Brazilian officials raise death toll in Rio raid to at least 132
items.summary: SAO PAULO (Reuters) -At least 132 people were killed during a deadly police raid in Brazil's Rio de Janeiro, the Rio de Janeiro public defender's office said on Wednesday, a day after the operation took place. Mourners gathered in the streets of Rio de Janeiro near where the operation took place as bodies were laid on the road. Read full story

items.title: Older Google Pixel phones can’t precisely locate UWB trackers
items.summary: Google introduced support for the ultra-wideband (UWB) wireless protocol with the Pixel 6 Pro in 2021. But if you’ve been struggling to get your Pixel phone to precisely locate one of the few Android-compatible trackers that support UWB, it’s because that feature is only enabled on the Pro models of the Pixel 8 and above, […]

items.title: Nvidia is officially a $5 trillion company

MacKenzie Sigalos / CNBC:
Amazon opens Project Rainier, an $11B AI data center on 1,200 acres in Indiana that trains and runs Anthropic's AI models using 500K+ Amazon Trainium 2 chips  —  NEW CARLISLE, Indiana — A year ago, it was farmland.  Now, the 1,200-acre site near Lake Michigan is home to one of the largest operational AI data centers in the world.

items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, Sharge is offering its 170W 24,000mAh Power Bank back at $98.99 shipped in both colorways, which we last saw during Prime Day three weeks ago. It would normally cost you $169 at full price, though it would be surprising to pay so much in 2025, as discounts have regularly and steadily repeated the deal at this same rate. You’re once again able to pick one up for your on-the-go kit with a $70 markdown at the best price we have tracked. If you want to save a little more, you can also find its 140W 20,000mAh variant down at $89 shipped right now, too.

items.summary:
Update 10/29: Autel has dropped the price on this advanced power station to a new all-time low of $1,570 shipped.

Through its official Amazon storefront, folks can jump on Autel’s unique Home 3000 Portable Power Station that features a built-in AI voice assistant at $1,659 shipped, after clipping the on-page $400 off coupon. Carrying a $2,059 full price since hitting Amazon in early August, we spotted this same deal for the first time on the last day of September, having only dropped to $1,689 before that. The $400 markdown has been sticking around in the weeks since, providing you with extended time to score your own at the best price we have tracked since its release back in April.

items.summary:
As part of its Deals of the Day, Best Buy is offering the best rate on the Greenworks 80V 20-inch Cordless Snow Blower with 4.0Ah battery and rapid charger at $249.99 shipped. Normally, this handy winter machine fetches $450 at full price here, with the closest match we could find on Amazon being the kit that gives you a 2.0Ah battery and standard charger sitting at a full rate of $499. This is only the second time this year we’ve spotted this particular package getting a discount, with February having offered this same rate and 2024 having seen the price taken as low as $300 before that. For the rest of the day, you can pick it up with a $200 markdown that lands it back at an all-time low price.

amFilm has been a go-to brand for affordable and reliable screen protectors for all kinds of devices. The set highlighted here is designed for the latest Switch 2 handheld with a 7.9-inch display and includes two protectors. At just $2.50 apiece, it’s hard to argue against the value here, and you might want to stock up a pair of these as spare units just in case. items.title: Amazon’s entire eero Wi-Fi 7 mesh system range is discounted today: Eero 7, Pro, Max, and Outdoor models starting at $135
items.summary:
Amazon is currently offering some sweet deals on its entire range of eero 7 mesh Wi-Fi 7 systems, and pretty much everything from the standard eero 7 routers to the latest Outdoor 7 units are discounted at the moment. One of the more notable deals of the lot drops a single-node of its eero 7 mesh Wi-Fi 7 system down to $134.99 shipped. This 2025 Wi-Fi 7 mesh router debuted earlier this year with a $170 price tag, which it’s mostly maintained since release, aside from a brief drop to $145 during a limited-time deal. Today’s 21% discount, however, shaves $35 off its usual going rate to mark a new best price to beat. The dual and triple-node eero 7 systems are also discounted down to $219.99 and $279.99 shipped. Head below for more details, along with deals on the entire eero 7 Wi-Fi range.
